rev.comment: no reliable source indicated it is malware, probably too far-fetched to call it that
rev.diff:
Line 160: Line 160:
==Conduit Toolbar Controversy==
==Conduit Toolbar Controversy==
â
As of late 2010, some controversy has arisen with the release of a new version of the uTorrent client. The installation now includes [[malware]] in the form of the Conduit Engine, which installs a toolbar and makes homepage and default search engine changes to the user's browser. While most have had the option to opt-out of this feature, some users have reported that this installation is made without the user's consent, either installing this software and making these changes without notifying the user, or still going ahead after the user has explicitly opted out.<ref>{{cite web | title = uTorrent Browser Toolbar Mystery Causes Confusion | publisher = [[Torrentfreak]] | date = 2010-12-18 | url = http://torrentfreak.com/utorrent-browser-toolbar-mystery-causes-havoc-among-users-101218/ | accessdate = 2011-08-11}}</ref> In addition, there have been complaints that the software is extremely difficult to remove once installed.<ref>{{cite web | title = So long, uTorrent | publisher = First Arkansas News | date = 2010-12-15 | url = http://firstarkansasnews.net/2010/12/so-long-utorrent/ | accessdate = 2011-08-11}}</ref>
+
As of late 2010, some controversy has arisen with the release of a new version of the uTorrent client. The installation now includes [[adware]] in the form of the Conduit Engine, which installs a toolbar and makes homepage and default search engine changes to the user's browser. While most have had the option to opt-out of this feature, some users have reported that this installation is made without the user's consent, either installing this software and making these changes without notifying the user, or still going ahead after the user has explicitly opted out.<ref>{{cite web | title = uTorrent Browser Toolbar Mystery Causes Confusion | publisher = [[Torrentfreak]] | date = 2010-12-18 | url = http://torrentfreak.com/utorrent-browser-toolbar-mystery-causes-havoc-among-users-101218/ | accessdate = 2011-08-11}}</ref> In addition, there have been complaints that the software is extremely difficult to remove once installed.<ref>{{cite web | title = So long, uTorrent | publisher = First Arkansas News | date = 2010-12-15 | url = http://firstarkansasnews.net/2010/12/so-long-utorrent/ | accessdate = 2011-08-11}}</ref>
